items.content: I'm an experienced Oracle PL/SQL Developer that is also proficient in Java development. I'm versatile and not afraid to try out new things, for example Python.

I work persistently towards the end goal. I'm comfortable with all development models, like waterfall and/or agile. I can take on any part of the project cycle, from the early stages of defining & specifying details to the final test. I also find joy in maintaining an existing system.

I find it crucial to understand what stakeholders need and want. I'm happy to help them find new options in both existing and new systems. For this reason, I can easily collaborate between business and developers, like a Product Owner. I always think in terms of usability and user experience, and I will ensure that any solution work as intended.
My full and updated résumé can be found on rikke.rendtorff.dk.

pro202203.name: Showcase implementation & documentation on small Java project

include: Created solutions for problems and implemented them
Documented source code & explained solutions to problems
Showcased two different build tools & building without tools using Bash and DOS scripting
Created full user guide of how to run and use the project

pro202203.name: Online résumé at rikke.rendtorff.dk

include: Designed & implemented a data-driven résumé based on JSON

in India on an Oracle based student administrative system for UNI-C

content: This section of the page will not appear in the .pdf
The .pdf will have the site's "Light" theme
This page gets regular updates. The .pdf may be outdated as soon as it's made

rightClick.content: Right-click anywhere on the page and pick "Print" from the menu.

result.content: A print preview with settings will appear.

saveAsPDF.content: In the "Printer" section pick "Save as PDF"

noticeMargins.content: Notice that the print preview has added text to the margins.

moreSettings.content: Remove it by first pressing "More settings"

headersFooters.content: Scroll down to "Headers and footers". Setting it to OFF will remove the added text.

save.content: Press "Save" and pick the name & location of the .pdf file
